about_the_game:
Drive a kart on different locations in first person driver view only. Try to beat the race time of other players and put your name in the highscore list. To be faster you can configurate different settings of your kart. You will see your last round time in game on the steering wheel once you finished a round. Every engine power class has its own highscore.



You can drive with keyboard (WASD or Arrow keys , R restart track , 1-9 for radio , /*-+ for volume control, ESC for go back to menue). Its a development focus that you can drive good with keyboard. Steering Wheel + Force Feedback and Gamepads are supported.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS , Linux
  • Processor: Entry gaming system from 2016 (p.e. 3GHz Quad)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Entry gaming card from 2016 (p.e. NVIDIA GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 , ...)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: UBUNTU LTS
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 1600 or equal (Intel I7) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or equal or better (p.e NVIDIA GTX 1060)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (or newer)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (M1,M2,...) or Intel (x64 architecture with SSE2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Additional Notes: a 2013 IMac can start the game but has around 15FPS@1280x720 and is to slow. Steam Leaderboards Highscores dont work on mac.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: M1 pro or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: share your mac model fps experience in discussions
